analysis.career_trajectory: Started with Ruby in 2018, working on various projects including Rails-based web interfaces, Redis clients, and Jekyll assets pipelines. Pivoted to more systems programming tasks in 2023, exploring tools like buildkite and Docker.

technical_obsessions.evidence: No specific evidence found, but the developer has worked on Redis clients and has experience with database management.
